mapper.select:
SELECT s.SCREEN_SEQ as 'screenSeq' , s.SCREEN_NAME as 'screenName' , t.SHOWTIME_SEQ as 'showTimeSeq' , t.SHOWDATE as 'showDate' , t.SHOWTIME as 'showTime' , t.MOVIE_SEQ as 'movieSeq'
FROM admin.SCREEN s, admin.SHOWTIMETABLE t WHERE s.THEATER_SEQ = t.THEATER_SEQ AND s.SCREEN_SEQ = t.SCREEN_SEQ;
